attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGiIIt2ZP87TcwRDZyq_description
attribs.current:
Ability Score Increase: Your Dex is increased by 2 and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Elf Weapon Training⁠: You have proficiency with the Longsword, Shortsword, Shortbow, and Longbow.

Cantrip: You know one cantrip of your choice from the Wizard spell list. Intelligence is your Spellcasting ability for it.

Extra Language⁠: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGiOcNi4VhjXuHAm0kG_description
attribs.current:
You have learned to regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook. Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up), and none of the slots can be 6th level or higher.

For example, if you're a 4th-level wizard, you can recover up to two levels worth of spell slots.

You can recover either a 2nd-level spell slot or two 1st-level spell slots.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGiQdGXH0LbzymaxUpg_description
attribs.current:
When the Maimed Virulence descended upon Phlan, you were one of the unfortunate casualties of war. Captured during the initial assault, you have spent the last year of your life as a plaything of a capricious and malevolent overlord. While many of your fellow prisoners fell to the dragon's insatiable fury over the coming months, you and your fellow "survivors" were spared only for a worse fate as one of the dragon's magical experiments, leaving you and those who survived the torture scarred and disfigured.

What reasons the dragon had for releasing you few survivors, nobody knows. You only fear that those who died under his terrible claw were the lucky ones, and you and your fellow Dragonscarred are doomed for a fate worse than death.

Skill Proficiencies: Intimidation, Survival
Tool Proficiencies: Special (see origin below)
Languages: Draconic
Equipment: A dagger, tattered rags, a loaf of moldy bread, a small cast-off scale belonging to Vorgansharax – the Maimed Virulence, and a pouch with 5 gp of various coins (salvaged during your escape from Phlan).
Lifestyle: Wretched
Predragon: Scholar
Disfigurement: Left hand scaled w/ large claws and webbing
I know secrets of the Maimed Virulence, but fear the harm that may befall me should others learn them.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LGiRA-d8VTiKPhlnKAs_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a book of lore

• a bottle of ink

• an ink pen

• 10 sheets of parchment

• a little bag of sand

• a small knife.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LGiRXj3MDrtylyC2vBl_itemcontent
attribs.current: These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft. Each type of artisan's tools requires a separate proficiency.

attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LGiSS1qjDrdD7BrcWL-_name
attribs.current: daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows, Longsword, Shortsword, Shortbow, and Longbow.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LGiSfkhbGPHaV0oZpTC_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Bludgeoning, Alternate Damage: 1d8, Alternate Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LGiSlMqfomCdQO-3Wa-_itemcontent
attribs.current: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

attribs.name: character_appearance
attribs.current: Long blonde hair and tattoos of scroll work down her arms which Syviis, also known as Sy(sounded as sigh or C.V.) by her friends, uses as her arcane focus. She is tall and drab looking for an elf which lead her to the secluded lifestyle of the librarian. Her left hand is constantly covered by a long sleeve and a cloth wrapping.

attribs.name: allies_and_organizations
attribs.current:
The association of librarians. Her elven kin the Wyndsalor's. The coven of elderly women.

Two spies of the Coven have infiltrated the guild. As their handler I know who they are and communicate via dead drops around the guild hall.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiW0tn8aAVNojS96xL_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiW0tn8aAVNojS96xL_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiW3S1aOn7rEaKhwZQ_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you try to touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiW3S1aOn7rEaKhwZQ_spelldescription
attribs.current: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LGiW3SxaXREmDEKZhcs_atk_desc
attribs.current:
Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

At Higher Levels: The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiWMeIds1eVV2eEVFh_spelldescription
attribs.current: The target must pass a Wisdom save or take damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage is 1d12 necrotic damage; otherwise, it's 1d8.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiWMeIds1eVV2eEVFh_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The damage increases by one die when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LGiZ4yIQ94sW1CpT64Z_atk_desc
attribs.current:
The target must pass a Wisdom save or take damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage is 1d12 necrotic damage; otherwise, it's 1d8.



At Higher Levels: The damage increases by one die when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGia85G1KUROnKeYOwJ_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGia85G1KUROnKeYOwJ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LGiaP8YPY6N8YyJOiYw_atk_desc
attribs.current:
Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

At Higher Levels: This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGiW3S1aOn7rEaKhwZQ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGibbe8lSwxH7v8aJU1_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGibbe8lSwxH7v8aJU1_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGicDcXnNUb3Q6cfzmp_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGicDcXnNUb3Q6cfzmp_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4+1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGicDcXnNUb3Q6cfzmp_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot above 1st.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: A quiet persona, who is happiest with her nose in a book. When the subject piques her interest she studies it doggedly. I know secrets of the Glaephang, but fear the harm that may befall me should others learn them.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: The pursuit of knowledge is all that matters. Secretive: I am withdrawn, and hide my monstrous appearance for fear of drawing unwanted attention (Chaotic).

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Estranged from normal people by her own hunger for knowledge. I seek to reclaim and rebuild my former life to the best of my ability.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: OCD, Compelled by her desire for knowledge, Has on a number of occasions lost people around her for a hypothesis. Once I make up my mind, I follow my chosen course of action regardless of the consequences.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGnu9dXZfLZXZqadnoV_description
attribs.current:
You focus your study on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid. Some evokers find employment in military forces, serving as artillery to blast enemy armies from afar. Others use their spectacular power to protect the weak, while some seek their own gain as bandits, adventurers, or aspiring tyrants.

Evocation Savant
Beginning when you select this school at 2nd level, the gold and time you must spend to copy an evocation spell into your spellbook is halved.

Sculpt Spells
Beginning at 2nd level, you can create pockets of relative safety within the effects of your evocation spells. When you cast an evocation spell that affects other creatures that you can see, you can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and they take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGnw67mNkPBmlZIDaOP_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d10 piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet must pass a Dexterity save or take 2d6 cold damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGnw67mNkPBmlZIDaOP_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The cold damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above first.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGnxFo6Yiho0Jsrc7G9_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: 10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGnxFo6Yiho0Jsrc7G9_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: bat, cat, crab, frog (toad), hawk, lizard, octopus, owl, poisonous snake, fish (quipper), rat, raven, sea horse, spider, or weasel. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a celestial, fey, or fiend (your choice) instead of a beast.

Your familiar acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

When the familiar drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. It reappears after you cast this spell again.

While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as an action, you can see through your familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the familiar has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

As an action, you can temporarily dismiss your familiar. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As an action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in any unoccupied space within 30 feet of you.

You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you already have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new form. Choose one of the forms from the above list. Your familiar transforms into the chosen creature.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnw40k8xvB3TOscdHN_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. The attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight or can see through illusions.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnyZAcEDPU-xDAceyy_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.

Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnyZAcEDPU-xDAceyy_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnyxG708HKU7XAak0x_spelldescription
attribs.current: Touch a willing creature. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. Until the spell ends, the creature can use an action to exhale energy of the chosen type in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity save, taking 3d6 damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnyxG708HKU7XAak0x_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnzkSundIo79Wgfp8L_spelldescription
attribs.current: A line of fire 30 feet long and 5 feet wide shoots from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity save. A creature takes 3d8 fire damage on a failed save, or half damage on a success.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGnzkSundIo79Wgfp8L_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo-elDhJL7GA76vx4G_spelltarget
attribs.current: A willing creature who isn't wearing armor

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo-elDhJL7GA76vx4G_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends it if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGo-fo9AMb2xfWK6yeB_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGo-fo9AMb2xfWK6yeB_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magical items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo05vwBg-ZXg92eYZo_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell's effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo05vwBg-ZXg92eYZo_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGo0OB7UDIsVcqcCUg9_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGo0YUL6F5NSqZybrRP_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you, as long as you have seen it up close - within 30 feet - at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between you and the object.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0f6Ks5TXsqWEfBbE_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0f6Ks5TXsqWEfBbE_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to five falling creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0f6Ks5TXsqWEfBbE_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small feather or piece of down

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0f6Ks5TXsqWEfBbE_spelldescription
attribs.current: Reaction - When you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGo0mDXCLc08gwjUkLy_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature within range or two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGo0mDXCLc08gwjUkLy_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

This spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th Level (2d6), 11th level (3d6) and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGo0njUhxxOp3clmn8z_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGo0njUhxxOp3clmn8z_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny strip of white cloth

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGo0njUhxxOp3clmn8z_spelldescription
attribs.current: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGo0njUhxxOp3clmn8z_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0uALYM6mQ1MG6fks_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0uALYM6mQ1MG6fks_spelldescription
attribs.current: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4+4 temporary hit points for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGo0uALYM6mQ1MG6fks_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current: Studied wizardry at the Quin'divear school of magics. It was destroyed during her second year by the dragon Gleaphang. After the destruction of her school Syviis was taken in by a Coven of hags as an understudy. She quickly grew to master her magics and got rid of one of the trio of elderly hags becoming a full member of the Coven.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0aqt795tHqvTZz7Yz_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0aqt795tHqvTZz7Yz_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0aqt795tHqvTZz7Yz_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0aqt795tHqvTZz7Yz_spelldescription
attribs.current: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0awfTyQu6JIzP1rn8_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0awfTyQu6JIzP1rn8_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LI0awfTyQu6JIzP1rn8_spelldescription
attribs.current: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LMiVpx5HZ2KMTFcmBSv_atk_desc
attribs.current:
A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LMiXSBfv40xNGQZ9int_description
attribs.current:
Potent Cantrip
Starting at 6th level, your damaging cantrips affect even creatures that avoid the brunt of the effect. When a creature succeeds on a saving throw against your cantrip, the creature takes half the cantrip's damage (if any) but suffers no additional effect from the cantrip.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LYOF4cjr3Keg5Y-PHEK_spelldescription
attribs.current: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as an action. At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.
